summary: The history of the American government's war on marijuana in the 20th century.
cast: Woody Harrelson|Harry J. Anslinger|George Bush|Cab Calloway|Jimmy Carter|Chevy Chase|Tommy Chong|Dwight D. Eisenhower|Gerald Ford|Jerry Garcia|Allen Ginsberg|John F. Kennedy|Gene Krupa|Fiorello LaGuardia|Timothy Leary|John Lennon|Cheech Marin|Richard Maxwell|Gertrude Michael|Robert Mitchum|Richard Nixon|Yoko Ono|Eli Perell|Josh Perell|Nancy Reagan|Ronald Reagan|Harry S. Robins|John Sinclair|Douglass Smith|Stephanie Zari
title: Marihuana
